name: Bubble Woods Ground
description:
Welcome to the magical Bubble Woods Ground! Cute bunny babies hiding in the depths of bubble forest, slide your fingers, match colored bubbles, pop! Help Bunny Mom recover the baby!

Bubble Woods Ground is an addictive, exciting, brain-training puzzle game with hundreds of fun levels packed with awesome challenges, power-ups, and effects. Play for free today and join the bubble shooting journey!

COOL FEATURES:

* Tons of Exciting & Unique Levels

* Easy and Fun Play

* Breathtaking Visual effects

* Harmonious Music

* Excellent Replay Value

* No WiFi? No problem! Play offline!

How to Play

* Drag your finger to move the laser aiming and lift it to shoot bubbles

* Match 3 or more same colored bubbles to make them disappear

* Use props can make it easy for you to pass the game

* Use less shots to complete a level and try to earn full stars

Download now and play for hours!
